document.full_text: nigerian president goodluck jonathan goes into an election on saturday bolstered by division among the main opposition parties which has increased his chances of sealing victory in the first round.
document.title: split opposition boosts nigerian leader's poll hopes
lines_and_colors: nigerian president goodluck jonathan goes into an election on saturday bolstered by division among the main opposition parties which has increased his chances of sealing victory in the first round.
